mapper.select: SELECT a.ac02id, a.AC01ID, a.AA01002, a.AA02001, a.aa02002, a.ac02001,/*零售价*/ a.ac02002,/*批发价*/ a.ac02003,/*超市价*/ a.ac02004,/*集市价*/ b.AA11001, c.ab13004, b.aa11002 FROM ja_acx_02 a, ja_acx_01 b, ja_abp_13 c WHERE a.AC01ID = b.ac01id AND b.ab13id = c.ab13id AND c.ab13004 = #{ab13004,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.AB11ID in (3,65,66)
